text:
Happy Thursday people - I have a question in regard to setting module default parameters within drag and drop coded templates.

      `{% dnd_section %}`
        `{% dnd_module path='/a8-theme-2021/modules/Partners Carousel.module',`
					`offset=0,`
					`width=12`
         `%}`
      `{% end_dnd_module %}`
    `{% end_dnd_section %}`

Sorry for the weird spacing. Carried over oddly. What I’m trying to do is  set a default of 5 instances for a repeater image field I’ve set up. How would I go about doing this? in the docs, for dnd_modules, there doesn’t seem to be an option to add parameters.

I found the below in the docs, but I’m struggling to adapt this to my current use case.
```{% module path='../modules/recipe_card.module',
  ingredients=["Eggs","Ham","Cheese"]
%}```
Anyone willing to offer some guidance? Would really appreciate it.
do you have your fields.json handy?
ohhh…that’s how this works. Let me go poke around and see if I can figure this out. Still getting used to this model. Thank you!
